event.description: Ian Kinsler singles on a pop up to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Elvis Andrus strikes out swinging.
Michael Young singles on a ground ball to right fielder Ichiro Suzuki. Ian Kinsler to 2nd.
Andruw Jones pops out to third baseman Adrian Beltre on the infield fly rule.
Hank Blalock flies out to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Marlon Byrd doubles (9) on a line drive to left fielder Wladimir Balentien.
Nelson Cruz strikes out swinging.
Chris Davis called out on strikes.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia grounds out, shortstop Yuniesky Betancourt to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Ian Kinsler grounds out, second baseman Jose Lopez to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Elvis Andrus lines out to shortstop Yuniesky Betancourt.
Michael Young flies out to right fielder Ichiro Suzuki.
Andruw Jones pops out to first baseman Russell Branyan in foul territory.
Hank Blalock strikes out swinging.
Marlon Byrd flies out to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Nelson Cruz grounds out, third baseman Adrian Beltre to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Chris Davis called out on strikes.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia singles on a line drive to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Ian Kinsler singles on a line drive to left fielder Wladimir Balentien. Jarrod Saltalamacchia to 2nd.
Elvis Andrus flies out to right fielder Ichiro Suzuki.
Michael Young singles on a ground ball to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Andruw Jones pops out to shortstop Yuniesky Betancourt.
Hank Blalock pops out to third baseman Adrian Beltre in foul territory.
With Marlon Byrd batting, Michael Young picked off and caught stealing 2nd base, pitcher Erik Bedard to first baseman Russell Branyan to shortstop Yuniesky Betancourt.
Marlon Byrd grounds out, third baseman Adrian Beltre to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Nelson Cruz homers (7) on a fly ball to left field.
Chris Davis strikes out swinging.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Mark Lowe replaces Erik Bedard.
Ian Kinsler flies out to left fielder Wladimir Balentien.
Elvis Andrus called out on strikes.
Michael Young doubles (10) on a fly ball to right fielder Ichiro Suzuki.
Andruw Jones singles on a line drive to left fielder Wladimir Balentien. Michael Young out at home on the throw, left fielder Wladimir Balentien to catcher Rob Johnson.
Pitching Change: David Aardsma replaces Mark Lowe.
Hank Blalock singles on a line drive to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Marlon Byrd flies out to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Nelson Cruz singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Wladimir Balentien. Hank Blalock to 2nd.
Chris Davis grounds into a force out, pitcher David Aardsma to shortstop Yuniesky Betancourt. Hank Blalock to 3rd. Nelson Cruz out at 2nd. Chris Davis to 1st.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia walks. Chris Davis to 2nd.
Ian Kinsler strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Shawn Kelley replaces David Aardsma.
Pitching Change: Denny Stark replaces Shawn Kelley.
Elvis Andrus lines out to right fielder Ichiro Suzuki.
Michael Young flies out to right fielder Ichiro Suzuki.
Andruw Jones singles on a line drive to left fielder Wladimir Balentien.
Hank Blalock singles on a line drive to left fielder Wladimir Balentien. Andruw Jones to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner David Murphy replaces Andruw Jones.
Marlon Byrd singles on a line drive to left fielder Wladimir Balentien. David Murphy scores. Hank Blalock to 3rd. Marlon Byrd to 2nd on the throw.
Nelson Cruz singles on a ground ball to shortstop Yuniesky Betancourt. Hank Blalock scores. Marlon Byrd to 3rd.
Chris Davis walks. Nelson Cruz to 2nd.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia hits a grand slam (3) to center field. Marlon Byrd scores. Nelson Cruz scores. Chris Davis scores.
Ian Kinsler grounds out, third baseman Adrian Beltre to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Ichiro Suzuki pops out to first baseman Chris Davis.
Jose Lopez grounds out, second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis.
Mike Sweeney grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Chris Davis.
Russell Branyan strikes out swinging.
Adrian Beltre flies out to center fielder Marlon Byrd.
Wladimir Balentien grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Chris Davis.
Rob Johnson bunt grounds out, pitcher Vicente Padilla to first baseman Chris Davis.
Franklin Gutierrez strikes out swinging.
Yuniesky Betancourt grounds out, third baseman Michael Young to first baseman Chris Davis.
Ichiro Suzuki walks.
Jose Lopez grounds into a double play, third baseman Michael Young to second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis. Ichiro Suzuki out at 2nd.
Mike Sweeney grounds out softly, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Chris Davis.
Russell Branyan grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Chris Davis.
Adrian Beltre strikes out swinging.
Wladimir Balentien singles on a line drive to left fielder Andruw Jones.
Rob Johnson pops out to shortstop Elvis Andrus.
Franklin Gutierrez hit by pitch.
Yuniesky Betancourt strikes out swinging.
Ichiro Suzuki walks. Franklin Gutierrez to 2nd.
Jose Lopez reaches on a force attempt, fielding error by second baseman Ian Kinsler. Franklin Gutierrez scores. Ichiro Suzuki to 3rd.
Mike Sweeney grounds into a double play, second baseman Ian Kinsler to shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Chris Davis. Jose Lopez out at 2nd.
Russell Branyan walks.
Adrian Beltre grounds into a double play, third baseman Michael Young to second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis. Russell Branyan out at 2nd.
Wladimir Balentien grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Chris Davis.
Rob Johnson grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Chris Davis.
Franklin Gutierrez grounds out, third baseman Michael Young to first baseman Chris Davis.
Yuniesky Betancourt lines out to left fielder Andruw Jones.
Pitching Change: Darren O'Day replaces Vicente Padilla.
Ichiro Suzuki grounds out, second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis.
Jose Lopez strikes out swinging.
Mike Sweeney grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Chris Davis.
David Murphy remains in the game as the left fielder.
Russell Branyan doubles (6) on a line drive to right fielder Nelson Cruz.
Adrian Beltre hits a ground-rule double (8) on a fly ball to right field. Russell Branyan scores.
Wladimir Balentien grounds out, third baseman Michael Young to first baseman Chris Davis.
Seattle Mariners pitcher Shawn Kelley left the game due to an injured chest.
Pitching Change: Frank Francisco replaces Darren O'Day.
Rob Johnson walks.
Franklin Gutierrez called out on strikes.
Yuniesky Betancourt flies out to center fielder Marlon Byrd.
